description:
Learn all about AB testing from one of the top Consultants and Speakers on the subject in the world!  You will learn what to test, what not to test and some of the testing strategies that have made MILLIONS for some of Chris Stolz's clients.

All of the information in this course comes from developing AB testing and analytics strategies for companies like Microsoft, Saks 5th Avenue, Hudson's Bay and even Coca Cola.

This is real, actionable advice learned in the trenches.
title: Become A Conversion Rate Optimization Expert
